natural solution: We can write \begin{align} \frac{\sec x}{\sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} &= \frac{1}{\cos x \sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} \\ &= \frac{1 - \sin^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\ &= \frac{\cos^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\

assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. sec x = 1 / cos x"
and h1 : "\<forall> x. cot x = cos x / sin x"

shows  "sec x / sin x - sin x / cos x = cot x"
a_3.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Simplify
\[\frac{\sec x}{\sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x}.\] The final Answer is \cot x

 We can write \begin{align} \frac{\sec x}{\sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} &= \frac{1}{\cos x \sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} \\ &= \frac{1 - \sin^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\ &= \frac{\cos^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\
 &= \frac{\cos x}{\sin x} \\ &= \boxed{\cot x}. \end{align}

fixes x :: real and sec :: "real \<Rightarrow> real" and sin :: "real \<Rightarrow> real" and cos :: "real \<Rightarrow> real" and cot :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"

and h1 : "\<forall> x. cot x = cos x / sin x"
and h2 : "sin x \<noteq> 0"
and h3 : "cos x \<noteq> 0"
shows  "sec x / sin x - sin x / cos x = cot x"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer

shows  "(1 / cos x) / (sin x) - (sin x) / (cos x) = 1 / tan x"

(* ### Problem
 Simplify
\[\frac{\sec x}{\sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x}.\] The final Answer is \cot x

 We can write \begin{align} \frac{\sec x}{\sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} &= \frac{1}{\cos x \sin x} - \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} \\ &= \frac{1 - \sin^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\ &= \frac{\cos^2 x}{\cos x \sin x} \\
 &= \frac{\cos x}{\sin x} \\ &= \boxed{\cot x}. \end{align}
 *)

fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "sin x \<noteq> 0"
and h1 : "cos x \<noteq> 0"
shows  "(1 / cos x) / (sin x) - (sin x) / (cos x) = 1 / tan x"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
